attributes.review: This app glitches and it deleted ALL of my pictures and apps!!!!! I do not know how this could have happened but it did and i am livid!!!! It deleted my sons baby picture and now there is no way to get them back!!! I am devistated and to anyone who is thinking about getting this app DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! I REPEAT DO NOTTT GET THIS APP!!!!!! This has made me decide to vote for Biden and I suggest that you do as well!!!!!!!!😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: DELETED MY SONS BABY PICTURES!!!🤬🤬

attributes.review: this app is so bad! first of all this app supports an orange, second of all this app is what made me throw up everytime i opened it! i tried to contact the police to say how this app was horrible and cursed but they said they had more important business to handle such as MURDERING INNOCENT BLACK PEOPLE!! anyways i hope you never download this app and ARREST THE COPS WHO KILLED BREONNA TAYLOR! so i hope you all have a wonderful day! acab and blm ;)
attributes.title: absolutely horrendous app

attributes.review: First of all the app took up to 5 hours to download than it opens and I was greeted by a big fat orange loompa for Charles chocolate factory he must have escaped I think u should call the police on the racist loompa seconde... daddy trump had a lot of mean racist comments 😭🤡 my family was terrified because big loompas started showing up at our door 💕 selling cockroaches needless to say we only bought 3✨✌️

attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app in history I hate the app and everything about the app it’s just here just to be here because it literally has not the first porpoise to be an app this app need to be dragged and thrown in the farthest possible trash can there is it’s just so unnecessary it’s makes absolutely no freaking sense it’s just on the App Store to take up space
attributes.title: I hate this app with a passion :)

attributes.review: dear orange, I got tickets to your rally and unfortunately you made my turtle cry. he would not let me go. my turtle needed his daily walk so I have to miss out of your rally. I had to delete my turtles favorite game “train surfers” he was very upset. This app is why my turtle is mad at me. All he wanted to do is make tik toks of him playing with a gabbie Hanna audio. now he can’t. I’m very disappointed
attributes.title: you made my turtle cry

attributes.review: The worst app created by the worst person, YOUR OWN MOTHER said your shouldn’t be a politician.  How can the people of America listen to a man whose own family calls “narcissistic”, Trump’s own niece is writing a whole book highlighting this ignorant campaign. It is easier to penalize the minority for the reaction of bigot art treatment than it is to penalize behavior that was elicited by the merciless treatment.  Also trump has a small peen.
attributes.title: bad. not good. so sad.

attributes.review: It caused my phone to crash right after I downloaded it, not only that but i have plenty storage space and once I downloaded it and went on the app itself it crashed and I had to reset my phone twice just to delete it. Idk why Apple will support an app causing all these problems for people’s phones!
attributes.title: Waste of storage space

attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app trump started popping up on my phone every where and it wouldn’t stop. After a couple days of this I was tired of it and got a new phone but then on my old phone trump FaceTimed me and his trump ninjas came nocking on my door demanding for me to give this app a 5 star review. Then I deleted the app and they left. All is well in the world again.💕💕💕
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I was here to support president Donald J. Trump but I REALLY think that they should Check the app! After I got it my phone started to lag a whole lot! I tried to download it again and it didn’t work! I had to get a new phone! On top of that it took a long time to download for some reason. I recommend try to fix the app or make a new one!
attributes.title: The app made my phone lag

attributes.review: It took a day & a half for the app to download & once it download the app started to glitch everytime I tried to use it , it would kick me off & say try again later . And it has a mysterious orange guy on the front 😐 .. that orange man isn’t Obama sooo I think that you guys need to fix the app or delete it which everyone gets the app off of my phone 🤗 .
attributes.title: Horrible app ..
